r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n: * PCBC-523: Add tracing support for queries and the rest of KV commands. * PCBC-536: Make it clear that timeout properties use microseconds. * PCBC-531: Field encryption (See https://packagist.org/packages/couchbase/couchbase-encryption). * PCBC-537: Implement Bucket#getName() returning bucket name.
